page.title: 07SCHOOLS
page.content: SCHOOLS _______ There are 4 Primary schools in our area and 1 Comprehensive.We are taught through the medium of Welsh because it is our home language.A lot of English children who have moved to live here learn the language very quickly.When we are 11 years old we move from the Primary school to the secondary school.Our school has 190 children,including infants and juniors.There are 12 teachers,three men and nine women. School starts at 9.00a.m and ends at 3.30p.m(infants finish at 3.00p.m).We have a break at 10.30a.m for quarter of an hour and a lunch break of 1 hour from 12.00p.m till 1.00p.m.
